title: What to Watch on TV Friday , April 4 , 2025
body_text:
On TV this Friday: Michelle Williams stars in Dying for Sex, Morena Baccarin returns to Fire Country and Grosse Pointe Garden Society takes up a new address.
Showtimes for April 4, 2025
ET
Dope Thief
Apple TV+
Manny feels compelled to make amends; Mina digs into Jack’s part in the operation; an unexpected person comes to Ray’s rescue.
Dying for Sex
HuluALL EIGHT EPISODES
Limited series premiere: A woman (Michelle Williams) with Stage IV metastatic breast cancer leaves her husband (Jay Duplass) to explore her sexual desires; Jenny Slate and Sissy Spacek co-star. (Watch trailer.)
Girl You Know It's True
PeacockSTREAMING PREMIERE
Music duo Milli Vanilli (played here by Tijan Njie and Elan Ben Ali), who caused one of the most infamous scandals in international pop music, get the biopic treatment.
Surface
Apple TV+PENULTIMATE EPISODE
James gets caught in the Huntleys’ crosshairs as the walls close in on Sophie.
Y2K
MaxSTREAMING PREMIERE
Rachel Zegler is among a group of high schoolers who attempt to survive when the year 2000 causes all technology to come to life and turn against humanity.
Yellowjackets
Paramount+ With ShowtimePENULTIMATE EPISODE
The Yellowjackets’ rites of spring finally come to an end; Misty gets a pick-me up; Shauna worries about a sticky Melissa problem. (Biggest questions... and answers?)
ET
NCAA Women's Basketball
ESPNMARCH MADNESS
Final Four: South Carolina vs. Texas (7 pm); UCLA vs. UConn (9:30 pm). (See full schedule.)
ET
Grosse Pointe Garden Society
NBCTIME SLOT PREMIERE
Birdie grows more involved in a tempting affair; in flash forwards, Catherine's marriage faces new hurdles when law enforcement seeks answers.
NCIS: Sydney
CBS
The suspicious death of a U.S. Navy choir singer draws the team into the world of obsessive fans.
Power Book III: Raising Kanan
Starz
Raq and Marvin navigate a dwindling supply of product, while Lou and Imani scout artists together.
ET
Fire Country
CBS
Bode and Sheriff Mickey Fox (Morena Baccarin) investigate the attempted murder of her estranged father (W. Earl Brown). (Watch preview.)
ET
S.W.A.T.
CBS
The abduction and brutal torture of two college football stars puts the team on the trail of a violent drug dealer looking to extract vengeance for a drug deal gone bad.
Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny
History
Series premiere: Duchovny presents the latest evidence behind some of the government’s most secretive, strange and mind-blowing activities.
